title.en: Kunoichi Tsubaki no Mune no Uchi

altTitles.ja: くノ一ツバキの胸の内

altTitles.en: In the Heart of Kunoichi Tsubaki

altTitles.tl: Ang nilalaman ng puso ni Kunoichi Tsubaki

description.en:
The isolationist Akane Clan, composed of an all-girls body mainly consisting of young kunoichi in training, has a code to which they all must adhere:  
  
As men are beings of danger, to exchange with them is forbidden.  
  
Kunoichi Tsubaki, the leader of the Dog Squad, is an excellent trainee with a promising future, but she has started to experience a strange feeling in her heart… whenever the subject of boys is brought up.
description.pt-br: A Líder do time Kunoichi, Tsubaki, é a melhor aluna em sua escola somente de Kunoichis, porém ela tem subordinadas que são difíceis de cuidar, além de uma certa curiosidade em saber como é o sexo oposto…
description.tl: Sa malayong kabundukan na tila wala sa mapa, naninirahan ang grupo ng mga kunoichi na tinatawag na Angkan ng Akane. Sama-sama silang nagsisikap upang pagbutihin ang kanilang mga kasanayan, at lahat sila ay sumusunod sa isang di-mababasag na batas: "Mahigpit na ipinagbabawal ang pakikipag-ugnayan sa mga lalaki." Ngunit nagkaroon ng hindi inaasahang pagbabago nang si Tsubaki, ang lider ng isa sa mga grupo, ay nagsimulang makaramdam ng kakaibang damdamin tuwing nababanggit ang tungkol sa mga lalaki.

biography.en:
Sōichirō Yamamoto (山本 崇一朗, Yamamoto Sōichirō, born May 31, 1986) is a Japanese manga artist. He is known for writing and illustrating [Teasing Master Takagi-san](https://mangadex.org/title/6e445564-d9a8-4862-bff1-f4d6be6dba2c/karakai-jouzu-no-takagi-san), [Fudatsuki no Kyōko-chan](https://mangadex.org/title/3ac9fd03-e3de-4520-90aa-d9fc002eac0a/fudatsuki-no-kyoko-chan), [In the Heart of Kunoichi Tsubaki](https://mangadex.org/title/1ab5f7e0-7768-457c-9f63-19471b6503cc/kunoichi-tsubaki-no-mune-no-uchi), and [When Will Ayumu Make His Move?](https://mangadex.org/title/425f2ccf-581f-42cf-aed3-c3312fcde926/soredemo-ayumu-wa-yosetekuru), all of which were ran simultaneously during their publication. 

Yamamoto was born and raised in the town of Tonoshō in Shōdoshima, an island part of Kagawa Prefecture. His hometown would later serve as the setting for Teasing Master Takagi-san.

He is a graduate of Kyoto Seika University Faculty of Art. 

(Source: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C5%8Dichir%C5%8D_Yamamoto))

Yamamoto was born and raised in the town of Tonoshō in Shōdoshima, an island part of Kagawa Prefecture. His hometown would later serve as the setting for Teasing Master Takagi-san.

He is a graduate of Kyoto Seika University Faculty of Art. 

(Source: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C5%8Dichir%C5%8D_Yamamoto))
